languages.text: "Как помог{mf||ла} мне сложить славную песнь в бою против Крика скверны — помнишь? Спев ее до конца, я понял, что связь моя с братьями крепче, чем усталость и горе".

"You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."
languages.original_text: "Как помог{mf||ла} мне сложить славную песнь в бою против Крика скверны — помнишь? Спев ее до конца, я понял, что связь моя с братьями крепче, чем усталость и горе".

traits.locale_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious song in battle against Balescream — remember? As the last note left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious song in battle against Balescream — remember? As the last note left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious song in battle against Balescream — remember? As the last note left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Me ayudó a componer un verso gloriosa en la batalla con Doomscream, ¿recuerda? Cuando la última palabra dejó mis labios, me di cuenta de que el vínculo entre mis hermanos y yo era más fuerte que el cansancio y el dolor».
languages.original_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."

traits.locale_text: «Me ayudó a componer una canción gloriosa en la batalla con Balescream, ¿recuerda? Cuando la última nota dejó mis labios, me di cuenta de que el vínculo entre mis hermanos y yo era más fuerte que el cansancio y el dolor».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你还记得吗？和灾啸的战斗中，你帮我谱写了辉煌的诗篇。当最后一个音符离开我的嘴唇时，我意识到，我和我的兄弟们之间的纽带，比疲惫与悲哀的负担更加强大。”
languages.original_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."

traits.locale_text: “你还记得吗？和灾啸的战斗中，你帮我谱写了辉煌的篇章。当最后一个音符离开我的嘴唇时，我意识到，我和我的兄弟们之间的纽带，比疲惫与悲哀的负担更加强大。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ドゥームスクリームでの戦いのとき、あんたが栄光の詞を作る手伝いをしてくれただろう？最後まで言い切った時、俺と兄弟たちの間の絆は、疲労や悲しみなんかよりも強いことに気づいたんだ」
languages.original_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."

traits.locale_text: 「ドゥームスクリームでの戦いのとき、あんたが栄光の詞を作る手伝いをしてくれただろう？最後まで言い切った時、俺と兄弟たちの間の絆は、疲労や悲しみなんかよりも強いことに気づいたんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Vous m'avez aidé à composer un glorieux verset lors du combat contre le Fléau Hurlant... vous vous souvenez ? Alors que la dernière parole quittait mes lèvres, j'ai compris que le lien qui m'unissait à mes frères était plus fort que la peine et la lassitude. »
languages.original_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez aidé à composer un chant glorieux lors du combat contre le Fléau Hurlant... vous vous souvenez ? Alors que la dernière note quittait mes lèvres, j'ai compris que le lien qui m'unissait à mes frères était plus fort que la peine et la lassitude. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir geholfen, im Kampf gegen Unheilsschrei einen glorreicher Vers zu verfassen – erinnert Ihr Euch? Als das letzte Wort meine Lippen verließ, erkannte ich, dass die Bindung zwischen mir und meinen Brüdern stärker war als Erschöpfung und Leid."
languages.original_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir geholfen, im Kampf gegen Unheilsschrei ein glorreiches Lied zu komponieren — erinnert Ihr Euch? Als die letzte Note meine Lippen verließ, erkannte ich, dass die Bindung zwischen mir und meinen Brüdern stärker als Erschöpfung und leid war."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."

languages.text: "Belanarası'na karşı savaşımda şanlı bir çatışma ortaya koymama yardım etmiştin, hatırlıyor musun? Son sözümü söylerken kardeşlerimle aramızdaki bağın, bitkinlik ve kederden daha güçlü olduğunu fark ettim."
languages.original_text: "You helping me to compose a glorious verse in battle against Doomscream — remember? As the last word left my lips, I realised that the bond between me and my brothers was stronger than weariness and woe."

traits.locale_text: "Belanarası'na karşı savaşımda şanlı bir çatışma ortaya koymama yardım etmiştin, hatırlıyor musun? Son sözümü söylerken kardeşlerimle aramızdaki bağın, bitkinlik ve kederden daha güçlü olduğunu fark ettim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
